content: Determine the category of this written piece that focuses on the beneficial influence of modern technology on our day-to-day activities.

The written piece you described would likely fall under the category of "Informative" or "Expository Writing." This type of writing aims to explain or inform the audience about a particular topic, in this case, the beneficial influence of modern technology on our daily activities. It could also be categorized under "Technology" or "Tech Lifestyle" if it specifically focuses on how technology impacts everyday life.
